entry.def: You can refer to a change that leads to a new period of growth and improvement in something as its rebirth .

example.ex: ...the rebirth of democracy in Latin America...
example.tran: 民主在拉丁美洲的复兴

example.ex: The hotel is awaiting its rebirth.

means.word_mean: 1. after death the soul begins a new cycle of existence in another human body

4. a spiritual enlightenment causing a person to lead a new life
